All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AdvisorStock
 
ChangePassword
The ChangePassword class provides a GUI for an employee to change their password.
CommissionRates
 
CreateUser
Creates a new instance of the User
CustomerDetails
The CustomerDetails class represents a GUI that displays the details of the customers.
DBConnectivity
 
EnterDate
The EnterDate class is a JFrame that prompts the user to enter today's date in the format dd/MM/yyyy.
HoverButton
The HoverButton class is a custom implementation of a JButton that changes its background color when the mouse hovers over it.
IndividualReport
The IndividualReport class represents the GUI for the individual report page, which includes buttons and fields for producing different types of reports for advisors and sales.
Log
The Log class provides logging functionality by creating a file and writing log messages to it.
Login
The Login class represents a user login page where the user enters their username and password.
Mail
The Mail class represents an email message with the ability to draft and send emails using Gmail SMTP server.
OfficeManagerBlanks
The OfficeManagerBlanks class represents the GUI for the office manager's blank management page.
OfficeManagerDiscountPlan
The OfficeManagerDiscountPlan class represents the user interface for managing the discount plan of the office manager.
OfficeManagerHome
The OfficeManagerHome class represents the home page of an office manager after logging in.
OfficeManagerStock
This class represents the user interface for managing stock of blanks.
OfficeManagerTicketStockTurnOverReport
The OfficeManagerTicketStockTurnOverReport class represents the graphical user interface for the ticket stock turnover report that can be accessed by the office manager user.
OfficeSaleReports
This class represents the sales report page for the office manager.
OutstandingPayment
The OutstandingPayment class is responsible for displaying the outstanding payments that are not yet settled by the customer.
Refunds
 
RefundsPayBack
The RefundsPayBack class represents a GUI that allows a travel advisor to process refunds for a customer.
SalesCardPayNow
The SalesCardPayNow class provides functionality for the sales representative to complete a payment for a travel booking using a credit card.
SalesCashPayNow
The SalesCashPayNow class represents the GUI for processing a cash payment for a sale in the Travel Advisor application.
SalesPayment
A class representing the sales payment window of the airline ticket booking system.
SalesSearchCustomer
SalesSearchCustomer is a JFrame class that allows a sales representative to search for a customer by first name, last name, email, and phone number.
SalesSelectTicket
The SalesSelectTicket class extends javax.swing.JFrame and provides a graphical user interface for a sales agent to select a flight and ticket to sell.
SaleSummaryPage
The SaleSummaryPage class represents a JFrame that displays a summary of a ticket sale.
SetCommissionRate
The SetCommissionRate class represents the GUI for setting commission rates for advisors.
SystemAdminHome
The SystemAdminHome class represents the home page for the system administrator, which allows the administrator to manage user details, customer details, commission rates, system stock, and backups.
SystemStock
 
TravelAdvisorHome
This class represents the home page for the travel advisor, which displays various options for them to select from.
TwoStepVerification
The TwoStepVerification class is responsible for generating a 6-digit verification code, sending it via email to the user's email address, and verifying that the code entered by the user matches the code generated.
UpdateUserDetails
This class represents the update user details frame where the employee can update their own details.
UserDetails
A class that displays and manages user details.
